Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; discoloured white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky brown below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; top of lip glazed; exterior: at rim, band of short vertical strokes between lines; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0926) (phase 2)
